title: A new Kayn Skin For Christmas | Candy Kayn
body:
This is My First Post Btw
------------------------------------------------------------------

I know that Kayn isn't even out on public servers yet, but it would be a great skin for Christmas Time. His Scythe would be a Candycane and he would have a cute santa hat. Maybe green and white socks who knows? He might even have just a red suit. This is just my thoughts about a Candy Kayn skin. I kind of have a feeling riot has already taken that 

into consideration. 

I don't have any art creations, when I can i'll draw some.

http://i.imgur.com/7WJSZah.jpg[/img]

replies.body: Make his form change a selection between Santa and Krampus and I'm sold on the idea.
I think this is an adorable idea, would love to see this made!
Or could have a reversed Christmas, since his entire theme is "dark or edgy" Could reverse the colors to black and blue? Maybe idk, just some ideas as well as the Christmas skin.
